product_overview: AI-Powered Data Utility Suite is a web application that leverages AI to extract metadata from images, generate tabular data, and facilitate API data mapping. It provides an intuitive UI with responsive navigation, theme capabilities, and performance monitoring to enhance user productivity in data management tasks.
core_goals: Enable users to upload and analyze images for metadata extraction using AI.
Allow generation of structured tabular data with customizable headers and types through AI.
Provide tools for mapping and transforming data between different API formats efficiently.
Offer a clean and responsive user interface with easy navigation and feedback systems.
Monitor app performance and provide feedback to ensure smooth user experience.
key_features: Responsive top navigation bar with mobile toggle using shadcn UI components.
Image Extraction module for uploading images and analyzing their metadata via AI services.
Data Generator tool for creating tabular data with specified headers and types using AI.
API Mapper feature to map, transform, and validate data between source and target APIs with interactive UI controls.
Performance Monitoring using zustand store and timing helpers to track operation durations.
Toast notification system for real-time user feedback and alerts.
Theme and styling managed through TailwindCSS with configurable theme tokens.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the Home Page with introduction and navigation options.
User navigates via Navbar to Image Extraction, uploads images, and views analyzed metadata results.
User proceeds to Data Generator page to create tabular data by specifying headers and types, then generates data through AI.
User accesses API Mapper to select source and target APIs, map fields, and transform data accordingly.
Application shows toast notifications for operation successes, errors, and system feedback.
Performance monitoring runs in background to track and optimize operation times.
Theme and layout adapt responsively with TailwindCSS ensuring consistent UI across devices.
validation_criteria: Successful upload and AI analysis of images with accurate metadata extraction.
Generated tabular data matches user-defined headers and types and is AI-generated properly.
API Mapper correctly maps data between source and target APIs, with user controls functioning as expected.
Navbar and navigation components work responsively and toggle correctly on mobile.
Toast notifications appear timely and convey appropriate messages for user actions.
Performance metrics are captured and logged accurately to verify system efficiency.
UI styling maintains consistency across browsers and devices using TailwindCSS themes.
